title: Officer (Commercial Vehicles Warranty & Operation Support)
description_html:
Coordinate Zung Fu Multibrand Operating Model (MBOM) warranty processes
Monitor and review the effectiveness MBOM warranty processes with Manager/ Assistant Manager, Workshop
Circulate technical guidelines, warranty operational update, recalls, Service Measures (SM) from OEM to service centres timely
Execute all recall and SM timely in accordance with OEM standards and report to Manager/ Assistant Manager, Workshop
Ensure warranty and technical-related document, and other applicable files are accurately, effectively archived
Support Manager/ Assistant Manager, Workshop to deliver technical workshop and training over OEM Dealer Standards
Provide technical support to follow-up tasks consolidated from internal regular inspection
Support Manager/ Assistant Manager, Workshop to ensure service centres operational compliance to occupational safety, health (OSH) policies
Coordinate regular technical warranty meetings internally and with OEM
Perform ad-hoc duties as assigned by superiors

title: Product Expert
description_html:
Performing vehicle introduction
Fascinating customers with our products and features and ensuring customers begin their smart ownership experience with full knowledge of the brand and products

Delivering the “Best Customer Experience”

title: Apprentice Mechanic / Body Repairer / Painter
description_html:
• To assist in maintenance jobs as assigned by Mechanic/Chargehand/Foreman
  • To assist in paintwork as assigned by painter/senior painter/Chargehand
  • To assist in bodywork as assigned by the body Repairer/senior body Repairer/Chargehand
  • To assist in parts Operation as assigned by the Parts Supervisor
  • To assist in service Marketing and Warranty as assigned by Administration Office
  • To engage in improvement projects as assigned by Assistant Service Manager/Service Manager
  • Work Location: Chai Wan / Hung Hom / Yuen Long / Kwai Chung / Fanling / Lau Fau Shan / Tin Shui Wai
description_text:
To assist in maintenance jobs as assigned by Mechanic/Chargehand/Foreman
To assist in paintwork as assigned by painter/senior painter/Chargehand
To assist in bodywork as assigned by the body Repairer/senior body Repairer/Chargehand
To assist in parts Operation as assigned by the Parts Supervisor
To assist in service Marketing and Warranty as assigned by Administration Office
To engage in improvement projects as assigned by Assistant Service Manager/Service Manager
Work Location: Chai Wan / Hung Hom / Yuen Long / Kwai Chung / Fanling / Lau Fau Shan / Tin Shui Wai

title: System Engineer
description_html:
• Within the guidelines provide by the Supervisor, the job holder is
responsible to analyze, design, install and configure network
infrastructure and application components, and is required to maintain a
stable IT infrastructure and the computing environments for the company
to meet with various business requirements.
• The job holder has to ensure information security and other IT policies are
adhered to when designing and implementing systems, networks and IT
services and ensure proper system controls are in place.
• Provide support to desktops and servers operation in Microsoft
environment, major in servers operation.
• Experience with cloud networking, storage and compute services
• Assist supervisor in monitoring an updating Infrastructure Service request
and incident tickets to ensure the requests can be completed as per SLA.
• Perform new System / PC installation, set up of equipment in the office
and for motor shows, office renovations and etc., and install authorized
software to desktops or laptops as per user requests.
• Maintain IT assets inventory including both hardware and software and
liaise with vendor for quality hardware (PC, printer, routers and etc)
maintenance.
• Perform routine backup of various systems and Execute Disaster
Recovery drills for mission critical systems.
• Source, test and recommend the use of new technology as requested by
users or as new business needs, or as efficiency improvement. Conduct
functional assessment on hardware or software during product selection.
